title: Extension
description: An Extension is provided by a distribution.

file.description: The value must contain a relative file path from the root of the distribution to the file containing the extension. The path must be specified with unix conventions.

version.description: This field contains a version for the extension. All extensions must have versions.

abstract.description: A short String value describing the extension.

docfile.description: The value must contain a relative file path from the root of the distribution to the file containing documentation for the extension. The path must be specified with unix conventions.
